thread.title: Why Abdallah Candies likes Apple Valley
thread.title_full: Why Abdallah Candies likes Apple Valley

author: Brian Johnson
title: Why Abdallah Candies likes Apple Valley
text:
Home / News / Construction & Development / Why Abdallah Candies likes Apple Valley Abdallah Candies plans to break ground early next year on this new production and retail facility on a 20-acre site at 147th Street and Johnny Cake Road in Apple Valley. (Submitted image: Wilkus Architects) Why Abdallah Candies likes Apple Valley By: Brian Johnson October 1, 2015 5:04 pm 0 Apple Valley is the winner of the Abdallah Candies expansion sweepstakes. After flirting with potential locations in a handful of other cities, the gourmet candy maker said it has chosen a 20-acre vacant site in that south metro suburb as the home for its new $12 million production and retail facility.
